description:
Versatile pants for everyday winter adventures or hiking through snowy settings. The tough fabric and DWR finish sheds light rain and snow fall.

  • Water resistant soft shell fabric is made of a durable blend of nylon and polyester with a hint of spandex for range of movement
  • Soft brushed lining is bonded to the exterior fabric
  • Fixed waistband with belt loops and hidden adjustable waistband for a perfect fit
  • Zip fly with a snap closure
  • Two front slash pockets and one thigh pocket with hook and loop closure hold small essentials
  • Articulated knees and gussetted crotch for easy movement
name: MEC Surplus Pants - Children
